output.sentences: Tim's car was out of the garage just in time for the race.
You can tell he takes good care of his car as Tim opens the hood to show off the engine before the race.
Tim is my favorite racer because he always works hard to win.
His car looked so beautiful it made me jealous.
Now that we have admired the car it was time for Tim so start the race and earn another win.
